a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Self-reported life satisfaction: young vs. old people

The survey question asks respondents to rate their current life on a hypothetical
ladder
from 0 to 10 (where 10
= best possible life). The vertical axis is the average response of people up to 29 years old, the horizontal axis
the average response of people aged 60 and older.
Data source: Gallup World Poll via the World Happiness Report (2024)
